初始拥有[剑意值][弦意值]各50点，最大100点。\n基于自身[剑意值]，近战:
Begins with 50 points each of [Sword Intent] and [String Intent] (maximum 100).
 [Sword Intent] increases Melee Weapon Damage Dealt and Melee Weapon Trigger Probability, and reduces the Sanity Cost of [Lightswords Slice Starry Streams]. At maximum [Sword Intent], Sanity Cost is further reduced by 30.
 [String Intent] increases Ranged Weapon Damage Dealt and Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability, and reduces the Sanity Cost of [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams]. At maximum [String Intent], Sanity Cost is further reduced by 30.
While in [Aspect Manifestation] state, each time damage is dealt with a melee weapon, 1 point of [Sword Intent] converts into [String Intent]. While out of [Aspect Manifestation] state, each time damage is dealt with a ranged weapon, 1 point of [String Intent] converts into [Sword Intent].

When an enemy with [Electric Charge] is defeated, their [Electric Charge] is transferred to another random target within a 20-metre radius.

When the user holds 2 or more [Talismans], this skill transforms based on the combination.
自身处于[雷风齐四方]领域范围内时，全属性穿透提高55%。: When within [Four Realms Align]'s range, increases Zhiliu's PEN stats by 55%.
自身带有[白炽]时，[晨昏]的剑气伤害提高70%。: While under [Incandescence], [Dawn Beyond Night]'s Swordwaves deal 70% more damage.
自身和队友拾取掉落物时，自身获得1层永续的[捡到宝了！]：技能威力提高，最多叠加: When the user or allies pick up loot, the user gains 1 stack of [Jackpot!], lasting for the rest of the battle. Each stack increases Skill Intensity, up to 20 stacks.
自身和队友释放战技和终结技后，获得1层技能速度提高效果，最多叠加2层，叠加时刷新: Using a Combat or Ultimate Skill (by the user or nearby allies) grants 1 stack of Skill Speed Increase, up to 2 stacks. Remaining Time refreshes each time a new stack is gained.
自身和队友移动速度提高。每秒随机选取自身周围范围内的1名敌人造成雷属性伤害，并轮: Increases Movement Speed for self and allies. Every second, deals Electro Damage to 1 random enemy in range, alternating between [Positive Charge] and [Negative Charge]. Prioritises enemies with no [Electric Charge].
自身和其他队友造成雷属性技能伤害时，自身获得1层昂扬提高效果，最多叠加20层。: Grants 1 stack of Morale when the user or any ally deals Electro Skill DMG (up to 20 stacks).
自身获得[翠玉弥散]效果。效果持续期间，自身周围范围被炼金烟雾弥漫，自身和队友持:
Grants [Emerald Effusion]. While active, alchemical smoke fills the area around the user, continuously healing self and allies while slowing enemies in the area. 
While [Emerald Effusion] is active, generates 2 [Azoth Projectiles] per second.
自身获得永续的光属性追加伤害。释放[“在一个暖和的午后”]时，获得6层[梦笔生花: Grants additional Lumino Damage that lasts throughout the battle. Each time ["On a Warm Afternoon"] is used, grants 6 stacks of [Taleweaver Quill]. While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, generates 1 stack of [Taleweaver Quill] per second (up to 30 stacks).
自身受到的治疗提高50%，神智回复量提高25%。: Increases Lady Nifle's Healing Received by 50% and Sanity Recovery by 25%.
自身受到伤害时不会产生僵直，玄蛟环绕[煜明]盘旋，对碰撞到的敌人造成雷属性伤害，:
Immune to Hitstun. Xuanjiao hovers around [Yuming], dealing Electro Damage to enemies on contact (once every 2s per enemy).
 Xuanjiao absorbs HP damage inflicted on [Yuming]. When the absorbed amount reaches a set percentage of [Yuming]'s Max HP, [Xuanjiao Manifest] ends.
自身跳跃至空中，滞空期间将下次近战武器的下落攻击替换为[疑星落]。\n如果在[玄:
Yuming leaps into the air, and the next Plunging Attack is replaced with [Starlight Descent]. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state grants Yuming 1 [Reverse Scale].
When the amount of [Reverse Scale] reaches its maxium, [Starlight Descent] is enhanced to [Starstorm Descent].
自身消耗[电能]时，消耗量的50%转化为神智。: When consuming [Electric Energy], converts 50% of the consumed [Electric Energy] into Sanity.
自身消耗神智时，消耗量的一定比例转化为[电能]，[电能]上限与最大神智相等。: When consuming Sanity, converts a percentage of consumed Sanity into [Electric Energy]. The upper limit of [Electric Energy] is equal to the max Sanity.
自身拥有1枚[泉符·震]和1枚[泉符·巽]时，[天地演绎]被替换为此技能。\n移:
When holding 1 [Talisman: Zhen] and 1 [Talisman: Xun], replaces [Heaven-Earth Divination] with this skill. 
Removes all [Talismans]. Deals DoT to enemies in a forward area, then creates a [Four Realms Align] field at their location. Every 3s, targets up to 5 enemies within the field to creates a [Zhen-Xun Convergence] at their location, dealing Electro AoE Damage.
自身拥有2枚[泉符·巽]时，[天地演绎]被替换为此技能。\n移除所有[泉符]。对:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Xun], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Fortune's Clarity].
[Fortune's Clarity]: Consumes all [Talismans] to deal Electro Damage to enemies around and increase Zhiliu's Skill DMG.
自身拥有2枚[泉符·震]时，[天地演绎]被替换为此技能。\n移除所有[泉符]。对:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Zhen], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Thunder's Oracle Peal]. 
[Thunder's Oracle Peal]: Consumes all [Talismans], dealing Electro Damage to enemies in a straight line ahead.
自身周围生成[噩梦实验室]领域。再次使用该技能可提前关闭[噩梦实验室]。: Generates [Nightmare Lab] around Yale and Oliver. Using the skill again can close [Nightmare Lab] in advance.
自死亡堆叠的螺旋中，挣脱而出的谬误。: A fallacy torn from the spiral of death — a truth that was never meant to be.
最大生命值提高，并持续回复生命值。: Increases Max HP and continuously restores HP.
最多持有7把。发射后选取随机敌人作为目标，围绕目标飞行并不断飞向目标进行攻击，对:
Kezhou can have a maximum of 7 [Phanoplumes] at the same time. When launched, each [Phanoplume] selects a random enemy to orbit and homes towards them to attack, dealing Lumino Damage to enemies along the path. After attacking the enemy 3 times, the [Phanoplume] dissipates.

Targets hit by [Phanoplume] take additional damage, which is equivalent to a certain percentage of the DoT of Bonus Effect: Lumino multiplied by Kezhou's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.
